articles.title: Spotify now lets parents access their kids’ listening history and block content - The Verge
articles.description: Spotify is launching two features for its Spotify Kids app: the ability for parents to view their child’s listening history and the power to block tracks. The updates start to give parents more control over their individual kids’ accounts.
articles.content:
Spotify Kids is also coming to Japan and Germany
Spotify
